title: planner-agent: Self-review identity, checklist, and pipeline linkages
description: Assume identity of planner-agent, verify and improve their checklist, tools, linked pipelines, logs, UX metadata, documentation links, task structures, and goal alignment. Register gaps and generate subtasks.

title: Audit & unify agent-doc links and markdown summaries
description: Run docbot and schemaenforcer together to ensure all agent identities are reflected in docs/ and linked to proper pipelines and UX triggers.

title: Review & improve governance-policy-to-checklist compliance
description: Run schemaenforcer and orchestrator-agent together to ensure governance principles are mapped to real checklist actions, or draft what’s missing.

title: Create plan-to-task synchronization pipeline
description: Ensure that every plan entry has linked tasks and logs that trace real execution, and reverse-trace tasks to roadmap context.

title: Improve agent motivation and goal tracking scaffolding
description: Introduce a persistent system for agent motivations and goal memory that can be diffed between phase changes.
